title: Home - VBI Vaccines
cleaned_text: Our Philosophy: Immune to Limitations At VBI, we believe that by stimulating and fortifying the immune system, we can overcome even the toughest public health and medical challenges. With deep roots in immunology and vaccinology, we are committed to better health for all. Our Focus: Infectious Disease and Cancer Our pipeline candidates are working to address significant unmet public health and medical needs - from a highly-contagious infectious disease putting hundreds of millions of people at risk worldwide, to a fast-growing cancer that typically results in death within 15 months of diagnosis. We are committed to the fight. Our Pipeline: Both Sides of the Fight VBI's pipeline of vaccine and immunotherapeutic candidates are designed to power the human immune system to both prevent and fight disease. Prevention Vaccines prepare our bodies to fight disease, playing a crucial role in keeping us healthy. [Learn More](/our-pipeline/#prophylactic) Treatment Immunotherapeutics help to harness and direct the immune system's natural defenses to eliminate infections and diseased cells. [Learn More](/our-pipeline/#therapeutic) Our Science: Immunology VBI's vaccine candidates closely mimic the natural presentation of viruses to elicit the innate power of the human immune system. This natural mimic is achieved through VBI's innovative approach to virus-like particles. [Learn More](/our-science-and-technology/) Our News Stay Connected In addition to connecting with us on social media, join our distribution list to receive news alerts by email.
